va-headstone-grave-marker.title: Veteran's Headstone and Grave Marker
va-headstone-grave-marker.headline: Veteran's Headstone and Grave Marker
va-headstone-grave-marker.source.name: U.S. Department of Veteran Affairs
va-headstone-grave-marker.summary: A headstone, grave marker, or niche marker may be available to honor a veteran, service member, or eligible family member.
va-headstone-grave-marker.eligibility.la: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
va-headstone-grave-marker.eligibility.ac: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
a member of the National Guard/Reserve
